thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 30 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Nutrisystem Reports Q1 EPS Of $0.09

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Nutrisystem Reports Q1 EPS Of $0.09
text:
April 30 (Reuters) - Nutrisystem Inc:
* NUTRISYSTEM ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS, EXCEEDING REVENUE AND EPS EXPECTATIONS
* SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $693 MILLION TO $708 MILLION * Q1 REVENUE $210.9 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $207.3 MILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.06 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES 2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE BETWEEN $2.04 AND $2.14 * SOUTH BEACH DIET BRAND IS EXPECTED TO CONTRIBUTE APPROXIMATELY $70 MILLION IN REVENUE IN 2018
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $2.04, REVENUE VIEW $697.4 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.88, REVENUE VIEW $190.5 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
